name: Kim Jong-un
description: North Korean politician serving as Supreme Leader since 2011 and leader of the Workers' Party of Korea since 2012. He is the second child of Kim Jong-il (1941â€“2011), who was North Korea's second supreme leader from 1994 to 2011. He is a grandson of Kim Il-sung, founder and first supreme leader of North Korea from 1948 until 1994.
